mapper.select: SELECT ba.id AS id, u.user_name AS userName, ba.title AS title, ba.summary AS summary, ba.content AS content, bc.category_name AS blogCategoryName, ba.thumbnail AS thumbnail, ba.is_top AS isTop, ba.view_count AS viewCount, ba.update_time AS updateTime FROM blog_article ba INNER JOIN user u ON ba.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN blog_category bc ON ba.blog_category_id = bc.id WHERE ba.is_deleted=0
